Package com.camerontec.util.jmx

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IExtendedMBeanServer
    This interface complements interface MBeanServer with the following extra methods: IExtendedMBeanServer.registerMBeanSafe(java.lang.Object, javax.management.ObjectName), which behaves as MBeanServer.registerMBean(java.lang.Object, javax.management.ObjectName) but does not throw any exception when an error occurs.
    IMBeanInfoCompression Deprecated
    MBeanInfo compression is now deprecated and is replaced by MBeanInfo batching performed by the cascading agent.
    ITLSCapableJMXConnectorServer
    This interface defines the bean wrapping the JMX Connector Server.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultMBeanServerForwarder
    Do-nothing MBeanServerForwarder implementation.
    DescriptorFields
    Field names used in MBeanInfo descriptors.
    ExtendedMBeanServer
    Base implementation of IExtendedMBeanServer.
    JMXConnectorWithTimeout
    Utility class that allows to connect to a JMX service URL using a timeout.
    JMXServiceURLEditor
    Property editor used to manipulate JMX Service URLs.
    JMXUtils
    This class contains a collection of JMX-related utilities.
    MBeanInfoCompressionClientWrapper Deprecated
    MBeanInfoCompressionServerWrapper Deprecated
    MBeanInfoEnhancer
    Converts a provided MBean info to provide additional metadata that cannot be directly achieved through the JMX API.
    MBeanServerConnectionWrapper
    Delegation wrapper for an MBeanServerConnection.
    MetadataMXBeanBuilder
    Enriches the exposed MBeanInfo of MXBeans to include additional metadata that cannot currently be directly provided through the JMX API.
    ObjectNameConstants
    This class defines constants used to define object names.
    ObjectNameConstants.Keys
    Constant definitions used in key names.
    ObjectNameConstants.ObjectNames
    Constant object names.
    ObjectNameConstants.TypeValues
    Constant definitions used in key values for the "type" key
    ObjectNameEditor
    Property editor used to manipulate JMX object names.
    PatternBasedMBeanServerNotificationFilter
    Notification filter that enables MBean registration and unregistration notifications for MBeans matching one of the given object names or object name patterns.
    ScriptsMBean
    Scripts MBean shows scripts from given directory as attributes.
    TLSCapableJMXConnectorServer
    This bean wraps a JMX connector server and provides an alternative to Spring's ConnectorServerFactoryBean.
